channel.title: Is there a tut for a client maker
channel.description: ok i need a tut on how to make a client cuz i wana put custom items but i also dont want to use some1s server what do i do?

item.title: Is there a tut for a client maker
item.dc:creator: @jSherz jSherz
item.description:
@jSherz wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:2, topic:234656”]So u wana make a client from scrath? BLOOODY HELL, i would suggest getting galkon’s client and editing that (Very easy, also comes with a tut on hw 2 re-couler items) Just search

galkons client

In moparscape server bar.[/quote]

Building your own client would be immensly difficult. Find the source code of a popular client and then edit and re-build that. Even that option will require quite a bit of Java knowledge.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a tut for a client maker
